FCN¶

networks.fcn_vgg.FCN32_VGG16(image_shape, activation='relu', lr=0.1, optimizer='adam')[source]¶

Create FCN32 network based on a VGG16.

Parameters

  • image_shape (2D tuple) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • activation (str, optional) – Keras available activation type.

  • lr (float, optional) – Learning rate value.

  • optimizer (str, optional) – Optimizer used to minimize the loss function. Posible options: sgd or adam.

Returns

model – Model containing the FCN32.

Return type

Keras model

Calling this function with its default parameters returns the following network:

Image created with PlotNeuralNet.

networks.fcn_vgg.FCN8_VGG16(image_shape, activation='relu', lr=0.1, optimizer='adam')[source]¶

Create FCN8 network based on a VGG16.

Parameters

  • image_shape (2D tuple) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • activation (str, optional) – Keras available activation type.

  • lr (float, optional) – Learning rate value.

  • optimizer (str, optional) – Optimizer used to minimize the loss function. Posible options: sgd or adam.

Returns

model – Model containing the FCN8.

Return type

Keras model

Calling this function with its default parameters returns the following network:

Image created with PlotNeuralNet.
